subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: UMass and a number of other institutions are taking the step up to big-time college football in the interest of national exposure, but there is concern that such a move will backfire.
snippet: UMass and a number of other institutions are taking the step up to big-time college football in the interest of national exposure, but there is concern that such a move will backfire.
